frontmatter.title: Raspberry Pi Surveillance System with Cloud based Object Detection

node.html: Devised a surveillance system that performs near real-time object detection using AWS EC2. Implemented edge computing and auto-scaling to minimize usage of cloud resources.

This project has been created for my submission to the 2018 ChaLearn LAP Track 3. The objective of this project was to train an algorithm that can inpaint and denoise fingerprint images containing artifacts like noise, scratches, etc. to improve the performance of subsequent operations like fingerprint verification that are typically applied on such images. The submission finished at the 10th position in the Feedback phase of the competition.
A simple tool for labeling object bounding boxes in images, implemented with Python Tkinter.

frontmatter.title: Extract Semantic Information from Location Data

node.html: Developed a generalizable model to mine userâ€™s spatio-temporal data available on Google Takeout. Extracted semantic information such as the time spent by a user at a place and the type of place, for behavior analysis.
Worked on developing the games Yahtzee, Brickbreaker and Hangman solely using the Java ACM Library.
